verses.text: Now \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* banished \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* (\w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*;

\w they|strong="H2671"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w archers|strong="H7198"\w* using both \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w right|strong="H3231"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w left|strong="H8041"\w* hands \w to|strong="H7586"\w* sling stones \w and|strong="H7586"\w* shoot \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*; \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w they|strong="H2671"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s kinsmen \w from|strong="H3231"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*):
Ahiezer their chief and Joash, who were the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; Jeziel and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; Beracah; Jehu the Anathothite;
Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the Thirty and a leader over the Thirty; Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, and Jozabad the Gederathite;
Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite;
Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Joezer, and Jashobeam, who were Korahites;
and Joelah and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham from Gedor.

\w Some|strong="H4480"\w* Gadites defected \w to|strong="H1121"\w* David \w at|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* stronghold \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* desert. They \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor, trained \w for|strong="H1121"\w* battle, experts \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* shield \w and|strong="H1121"\w* spear, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* faces \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* faces \w of|strong="H1121"\w* lions \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* swift \w as|strong="H1121"\w* gazelles \w on|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* mountains:
Ezer the chief, Obadiah the second in command, Eliab the third,
Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
Jeremiah the tenth, and Machbanai the eleventh.

These Gadites were army commanders, \w the|strong="H3414"\w* least \w of|strong="H3414"\w* whom \w was|strong="H3414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* match \w for|strong="H3414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hundred, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* greatest \w for|strong="H3414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* crossed \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Jordan \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* month \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* overflowing \w all|strong="H1419"\w* its banks, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* they put \w to|strong="H1121"\w* flight \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* valleys, both \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* east \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* west.

\w Other|strong="H3605"\w* Benjamites \w and|strong="H7223"\w* \w some|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Judah \w also|strong="H1992"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* David \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* stronghold.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w*, saying, “\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* peace \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* united \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*; but \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* betray \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* enemies \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hands \w are|strong="H1121"\w* free \w of|strong="H1121"\w* violence, \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* fathers see \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* judge \w you|strong="H5704"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Spirit \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Amasai, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* chief \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Thirty, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*: “\w We|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* yours, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*! \w We|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jesse! \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w helps|strong="H5826"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w received|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* leaders \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* troops.

Some \w from|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh defected \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistines \w to|strong="H5414"\w* fight \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Saul. (\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H7965"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistines \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistine \w rulers|strong="H7218"\w* consulted \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w*, saying, “\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* cost \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* defects \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* Saul.”)

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Ziklag, \w these|strong="H1732"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w defected|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, and Zillethai, chiefs of thousands in Manasseh.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* helped David \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* raiders, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w all|strong="H3212"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* valor \w and|strong="H3212"\w* commanders \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* army.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6635"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* day \w after|strong="H5921"\w* day \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w until|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* God. David’s Army Grows at Hebron

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H1732"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* numbers \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* armed \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w battle|strong="H4264"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Hebron \w to|strong="H5704"\w* turn Saul’s kingdom \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w accordance|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* word \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:
\w From|strong="H5921"\w* Judah: 6,800 \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w troops|strong="H6635"\w* bearing shields \w and|strong="H3068"\w* spears.
\w From|strong="H1121"\w* Simeon: 7,100 \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor, ready \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*.
\w From|strong="H4480"\w* Levi: 4,600,
\w including|strong="H4480"\w* Jehoiada, leader \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w with|strong="H4480"\w* 3,700 \w men|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3967"\w* Zadok, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7969"\w* young man \w of|strong="H5057"\w* valor, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* 22 commanders \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* family.

\w From|strong="H1004"\w* Benjamin, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* kinsmen \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul: 3,000, most \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w whom|strong="H1368"\w* \w had|strong="H8269"\w* remained loyal \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul up \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H5288"\w* \w time|strong="H8147"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* Ephraim: 20,800 \w mighty|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor, famous \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H8104"\w* own \w clans|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh:\f + \fr 12:31 \ft That is, the half-tribe of Manasseh west of the Jordan\f* 18,000 designated \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1368"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* David king.

\w From|strong="H4294"\w* Issachar, \w men|strong="H8034"\w* who understood \w the|strong="H1732"\w* times \w and|strong="H1732"\w* knew \w what|strong="H1732"\w* Israel \w should|strong="H1732"\w* do: 200 chiefs \w with|strong="H1732"\w* all \w their|strong="H1732"\w* kinsmen \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* command.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* Zebulun: 50,000 \w fit|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* service, \w trained|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* battle \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* weapons \w of|strong="H1121"\w* war, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w purpose|strong="H4100"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* devoted \w to|strong="H3478"\w* David.\f + \fr 12:33 \ft LXX; Hebrew does not include to David.\f*
\w From|strong="H3318"\w* Naphtali: 1,000 commanders, accompanied \w by|strong="H3318"\w* 37,000 \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* shield \w and|strong="H2572"\w* spear.
\w From|strong="H5973"\w* Dan: 28,600 prepared \w for|strong="H5973"\w* battle.
\w From|strong="H4480"\w* Asher: 40,000 fit \w for|strong="H6186"\w* service, \w prepared|strong="H6186"\w* \w for|strong="H6186"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* east \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Jordan, \w from|strong="H3318"\w* Reuben, Gad, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Manasseh there: 120,000 \w armed|strong="H4421"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H3318"\w* kind \w of|strong="H6635"\w* weapon \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, arrayed \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w came|strong="H6635"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* Hebron fully determined \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Israelites \w were|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* mind \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* spent three days \w there|strong="H3605"\w* eating \w and|strong="H3478"\w* drinking \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* relatives \w had|strong="H3478"\w* provided \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* far \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* Issachar, Zebulun, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* Naphtali \w came|strong="H1961"\w* bringing food \w on|strong="H3117"\w* donkeys, camels, mules, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* oxen—abundant supplies \w of|strong="H3117"\w* flour, fig cakes \w and|strong="H3117"\w* raisin cakes, wine \w and|strong="H3117"\w* oil, oxen \w and|strong="H3117"\w* sheep. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* joy \w in|strong="H3117"\w* Israel.
